text: Bernard Donovan (born 12 July 1995) is a Zimbabwean international footballer who plays for How Mine as a goalkeeper. ==Career== Donovan has played for Motor Action and How Mine. He made his international debut in 2014, and was named in the squad for the 2017 Africa Cup of Nations. ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Zimbabwean footballers Category:Zimbabwe international footballers Category:Motor Action F.C. players Category:How Mine F.C. players Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:2017 Africa Cup of Nations players
title: Bernard Donovan
